Name: Ally's Bistro
Description: Ally’s Bistro is a cozy neighborhood spot known for its warm atmosphere and thoughtfully prepared comfort food. It blends fresh ingredients with classic flavors.
Deals: Get any sandwich or entrée with a side and a drink for a discounted price during weekday lunch hours.

Name: Café Agora
Description: Cafe Agora is a casual café serving Mediterranean-inspired dishes, wraps, and coffee in a relaxed setting.
Deals: Buy one wrap or bowl and get a free fountain drink during lunch hours.

Name: Dave's Hot Chicken
Description: Dave’s Hot Chicken specializes in bold, Nashville-style hot chicken with customizable spice levels.
Deals: Get a combo meal at a discounted price after 8 PM.

Name: Bandero County Wood Grill
Description: Bandero County Wood Grill offers hearty, wood-grilled meats and classic American sides in a rustic atmosphere.
Deals: Free appetizer with purchase of two entrées on weekdays.

Name: Hot House Tavern
Description: Hot House Tavern is a laid-back tavern known for comfort food, burgers, and a rotating drink selection.
Deals: Half-price appetizers during happy hour.

Name: Kraverz Frozen Custard
Description: Kraverz Frozen Custard serves rich frozen custard, shakes, and classic dessert treats.
Deals: Buy one custard and get the second 50% off.

Name: Fiddleheads Coffee
Description: Fiddleheads Coffee is a modern coffee shop focused on handcrafted drinks and fresh pastries.
Deals: Free pastry with the purchase of any specialty drink.

Name: The Lunch Box Deli
Description: The Lunch Box Deli is a quick-stop deli offering sandwiches, soups, and grab-and-go meals.
Deals: Any sandwich, chips, and drink for a bundled price.

Name: Café Zupas
Description: Cafe Zupas serves fresh soups, salads, and sandwiches made with clean ingredients.
Deals: Free drink with any soup-and-salad combo.

Name: Chen's Gourmet
Description: Chen’s Gourmet offers traditional Chinese dishes with generous portions and bold flavors.
Deals: 10% off any dinner entrée with purchase of two or more items.

Name: Smart Cow Yogurt Bar
Description: Smart Cow Yogurt Bar is a self-serve frozen yogurt shop with a wide variety of toppings.
Deals: Get one free topping with any yogurt purchase.

Name: Woodman's Food Market
Description: Woodman’s Food Market is a large grocery store known for low prices and wide selection.
Deals: $5 off a $50 grocery purchase.

Name: Piggly Wiggly
Description: Local grocery store offering everyday essentials, fresh produce, and weekly specials.
Deals: Weekly in-store deals on select grocery items.

Name: Metro Market
Description: Neighborhood supermarket featuring fresh foods, bakery items, and household staples.
Deals: Save $5 on a $40 purchase with store card.

Name: Pick 'n Save
Description: Full-service grocery store with groceries, pharmacy items, and household products.
Deals: Digital coupon savings on select items each week.

Name: Karl's Country Market
Description: Family-owned market known for fresh meats, local products, and homemade foods.
Deals: $5 off any purchase over $50.

Name: Kohl's
Description: Department store selling clothing, home goods, and accessories.
Deals: Extra 20% off one regular-priced item.

Name: Target
Description: Big-box retailer offering groceries, clothing, electronics, and home goods.
Deals: Spend $50, get a $5 Target gift card.

Name: Walmart Supercenter
Description: Large retail store providing groceries, apparel, electronics, and essentials.
Deals: Rollback pricing on select household items.

Name: William Nordstrom Jewelers
Description: Jewelry store specializing in fine jewelry, repairs, and custom designs.
Deals: Free jewelry cleaning with any visit.

Name: McDermott Cue
Description: Manufacturer and retailer of high-quality billiard cues and accessories.
Deals: 10% off select cue accessories.

Name: Sit Means Sit
Description: Professional dog training service focused on obedience and behavior control.
Deals: Free training consultation for new clients.

Name: Hand & Stone Massage
Description: Spa offering massage therapy and skincare services.
Deals: $10 off first massage or facial.

Name: Anytime Fitness
Description: 24-hour fitness center with modern equipment and training options.
Deals: Free 7-day gym pass for new members.

Name: Falls Automotive
Description: Automotive repair shop providing maintenance and repair services.
Deals: Free vehicle inspection with any service.

Name: Evie's Vietnamese Kitchen
Description: Restaurant serving traditional Vietnamese dishes with fresh ingredients.
Deals: Free appetizer with purchase of two entrées.

Name: Harvey Moy's
Description: Classic Chinese diner-style restaurant known for comfort food favorites.
Deals: Free drink with any entrée purchase.

Name: Chili's
Description: Casual dining restaurant serving American and Tex-Mex cuisine.
Deals: Free chips and salsa with any entrée.

Name: B52's
Description: Local bar and grill offering burgers, drinks, and a casual atmosphere.
Deals: Half-price appetizers during happy hour.

Name: Menards
Description: Home improvement store selling building materials, tools, and home goods.
Deals: 11% rebate on eligible purchases.

Name: Aldi's
Description: Discount grocery store known for low prices and private-label products.
Deals: Weekly savings on Aldi Finds items.

Name: Bank of Flowers
Description: Florist specializing in fresh floral arrangements and gifts.
Deals: 10% off custom floral arrangements.

Name: Krueger's
Description: Arcade and entertainment spot with classic games and casual food.
Deals: Buy $20 in tokens, get $5 free.

Name: The Garcade
Description: Arcade featuring retro and modern games in a fun environment.
Deals: Free play credit with paid entry.

Name: AJ O'brady's
Description: Casual pub serving American food, drinks, and bar favorites.
Deals: Happy hour drink specials on weekdays.
